name: Knights of Ludd Blueprint Package
desc: A rare tome of unification-era designs up-rated for post-collapse use. Despite their truly ancient origins, these modular designs are hardy in a way few other hulls of the sector are.

name: Knights of the Abyss Blueprint Package
desc: A rare tome of post-domain designs down-rated for conventional use. Despite their incipherable origins, these technological wonders are powerful in a way few other pieces of equipment are.

name: Elysian Data Recorder
icon: data/strings/com/fs/starfarer/api/impl/campaign/you can hear it cant you/our whispers through the void/our song/graphics/icons/cargo/zea_lore_datacore.png
desc: A recovered data fragment. Accessing the device will reveal logs from the dark recesses of the sector, or, if you already know those secrets, award 25,000 credits.
